title.value: Use of Artificial Intelligence in the Identification and Management of Frailty: A Scoping Review Protocol
title.justification: The title is taken directly from the paper.
title.quote: Use of Artificial Intelligence in the Identification and Management of Frailty: A Scoping Review Protocol

extractions.description: This paper outlines a scoping review protocol to analyze the use of artificial intelligence (AI), including machine learning and deep learning, for the identification and management of frailty. It details the systematic search that will be conducted across eight major academic databases and presents the methodology for selecting and charting the data. The review will focus on clinical tools and frameworks used to assess frailty, the outcomes evaluated, and the engagement of knowledge users in the development and implementation of AI methods for frailty care.

type.justification: The paper details a systematic search and data charting methodology for a scoping review, indicating empirical data collection and analysis.
type.quote: This scoping review protocol details a systematic search of eight major academic databases...

name.justification: The primary field is the use of AI in healthcare, specifically for the identification and management of frailty.
name.quote: This protocol describes a scoping review aiming to identify and present available information in this area...

name.justification: The paper mentions the use of machine learning explicitly.
name.quote: Artificial intelligence (AI) has emerged as a potential solution... including machine learning and deep learning...

name.justification: The paper mentions the use of deep learning explicitly.
